sys_script.name: IT Assist IntceptIncNotif

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_7ca445ba97a231109b137076f053af84
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>false</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>incident</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>IT Assist IntceptIncNotif</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {
    var caller = current.getValue("caller_id");
    var caller_name = current.getDisplayValue("caller_id");
    var opened_by = current.opened_by;
    var number = current.number;
    var currentUserId = gs.getUserID();
    var itsm_horiz = new GlideRecord("x_831378_kore_ai_0_it_assist_config_horiz");
    itsm_horiz.query();
    while (itsm_horiz.next()) {
        if (opened_by.toString() !== itsm_horiz["user_sys_id"]) {
            var workbenchheaders = [
                "accept", "authorization", "datatable", "endpoint",
                "integration_service", "platform"
            ];

            var rm = new sn_ws.RESTMessageV2("ITAssistWorkbenchPing", "ITAssistWorkbenchPing");
            for (var header in workbenchheaders) {
               if(workbenchheaders[header] === "authorization"){
					var authValue = itsm_horiz.getElement("authorization").getDecryptedValue() + "";
					rm.setStringParameterNoEscape(workbenchheaders[header],authValue );
				}else{
					rm.setStringParameterNoEscape(workbenchheaders[header], itsm_horiz[workbenchheaders[header]] + "");
				}
            }
            var actions = [];
            actions.push({
                "type": "postback",
                "label": "View ticket " + number,
                "value": "View ticket " + number
            });

            var notification_text = "\nHi " + caller_name + ", \n Your IT ticket " + number + " just landed in ServiceNow! I'll be on it. Please check with me if you need any update";
            gs.info("notification_text:::" + notification_text);
            var item = {
                "_id": "_id",
                "body": notification_text,
                "target_id": caller,
                "target_type": "USER",
                "actions": actions,
            };
            rm.setRequestBody(JSON.stringify({
                "notifications": [item]
            }));
            var response = rm.executeAsync();
            gs.info("REsponse" + JSON.stringify(response));
        }
    }
})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-11-20 09:20:07</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>7ca445ba97a231109b137076f053af84</sys_id><sys_mod_count>66</sys_mod_count><sys_name>IT Assist IntceptIncNotif</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="IT Assist" source="x_831378_kore_ai_0">5db40dbc2f21111051c859a72799b60c</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="IT Assist">5db40dbc2f21111051c859a72799b60c</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_7ca445ba97a231109b137076f053af84</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-02-26 13:18:27</sys_updated_on><template/><when>after</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=7ca445ba97a231109b137076f053af84"/></record_update>
